thread.title: Ex-Arsenal star Serge Gnabry has hit the jackpot at Werder Bremen with stunning girlfriend Sarah who drives him to and from training
thread.title_full: Ex-Arsenal star Serge Gnabry has hit the jackpot at Werder Bremen with stunning girlfriend Sarah who drives him to and from training

author: tgannon
title: Ex-Arsenal star Serge Gnabry has hit the jackpot at Werder Bremen with stunning girlfriend Sarah who drives him to and from training
text:
EFL Gnabbed a winner Ex-Arsenal star Serge Gnabry has hit the jackpot at Werder Bremen with stunning girlfriend Sarah who drives him to and from training 
Germany international's girlfriend is also the sister of fellow Bundesliga player Thilo Kehrer Pictured Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments SERGE GNABRY has scored more at Werder Bremen in three months than he did at Arsenal in four years â€“ on AND off the pitch. 
The German has banged in seven Bundesliga goals since his Â£4.3million move to Bremen on deadline day. Instagram Serge Gnabry has scored off the pitch with stunning Sarah Kehrer 
But the 21-year-oldâ€™s biggest achievement this season is bagging himself a glamorous new girlfriend. 
Gnabry is dating Sarah Kehrer â€“ the sister of Shalke star Thilo. 
Keep up to date with ALL the Arsenal news, gossip, transfers and goals on our club page plus fixtures, results and live match commentary 
Stunning Sarah, who works as a bikini model, often takes the midfielder to training in a black Volkswagen. 
The couple enjoyed a romantic trip to New York over the winter holiday. A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Jun 29, 2016 at 6:36am PDT Instagram A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Jun 15, 2015 at 7:01am PDT A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Jan 1, 2017 at 7:34am PST Oct 24, 2016 at 8:41am PDT Saturday Premier League match preview featuring Man City v Tottenham Related Stories Arsenal fans fear the worst after Alexis Sanchez posts cryptic 'broken heart' Instagram message Penn to paper Former Liverpool and Arsenal winger Jermaine Pennant joins League One Bury until end of season SHOOT OUT Hear Ian Wright tell SunSport why the Golden Boot will be a straight fight between Harry Kane and Zlatan OUT OF AFRICA Manchester City starlet Kelechi Iheanacho on growing up in a ghetto, not being able to afford a football and being scouted by Arsenal PER DEAL Arsenal have given Per Mertesacker a new deal - even though he hasn't played a minute of football this season 
Gnabry left Arsenal for Bremen in the summer after failing to break into the Gunners first team. 
The Germany international, who scored a hat-trick in the World Cup qualifier against San Marino in November, supported his decision to leave the Emirates. 
He said: "It was the right decision [to leave Arsenal]. Everybody who compares my development over the last four months to my time in England before that canâ€™t come to a different conclusion. Getty Images Serge Gnabry left Arsenal for Werder Bremen last summer ðŸ’« A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Sep 29, 2016 at 6:00am PDT A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Sep 21, 2016 at 7:31am PDT ðŸ’‹ A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Jan 2, 2016 at 12:36pm PST A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Jul 1, 2015 at 1:02am PDT A photo posted by Sarah Rose K. (@sayrabrown) on Oct 13, 2014 at 11:13pm PDT 
"That was the main reason for the transfer â€“ I wanted to get more playing time and it worked. Arsenal wanted to keep me, badly. But I had to look after my development. 
"If a player does not perform well, a club has no sympathy and they do not want to keep him." 
Keep up-to-date with all the latest transfer news and gossip ahead of the January window with SunSport's daily LIVE blog Alex Ox-Chamberlain shares a video of Arsenal in training for the weekend
